english.segment1: Lighten your load friend sit by me. Tell me all about your day. The night is falling and words are free. and you're a friend of mine
english.segment2: You're running on empty it all seems wrong. Your loads too heavy this roads too long. You're doing your best just to hang on. And you're a friend of mine. Yeah, you're a friend of mine
english.segment3: Lean, lean on me as I lean on the one who's stronger. Lean, lean on me I'll lead you to the one who's stronger. Lean, lean on me
english.segment4: Life is so easy when you were young. Songs of love and joy were sung. But your love is lost and your joy is gone. And you keep wondering why. As time keeps flying by
english.segment5: Lean, lean on my as I lean on the one who's stronger. Lean, lean on me I'll lead you to the one who's stronger. Lean, lean on me
english.segment6: I'll do my best to be here for you through the years. But I can't carry all your hidden pain and fears. But there is one who wants to wipe away your tears. He is waiting
english.segment7: Lean on the everlasting arms of Jesus. Lean on the everlasting arms (2x)
english.segment8: Lighten your load friend sit by me. Tell me all about your day. The night is falling and words are free. and you're a friend of mine
english.segment9: Lean, lean on my as I lean on the one who's stronger. Lean, lean on me I'll lead you to the one who's stronger. Lean, lean on me
